p: Also labdane-type diterpenes are useful for the perfume industry, finding application as fixatives in high-end perfumes. Specifically, a fixative is a material with low volatility that provides long-term scent, aids in mixing with the other materials, and extends the shelf life of the perfume. The resin obtained from some plants of the Cistaceae family is one of the most common sources of labdane diterpenes used as perfume fixatives [ 113].
